subject: Order and shipping
description_text:
I live in the EU, and if i place an order from your website.

Would you ship it from within the EU or from a warehouse outside of the EU?

Kind regards Filip

conversations.body_text: Hi Tillo Neko,    The parcel will be dispatched from our German warehouse, so please do not worry.

Hello, I placed an order after your email. And recipient a tracking number.

The tracking indicates itâ€™s being shipped from china and not from Germany.

YT2526700701967263



>
Hi Tillo Neko,    Don't worry, Vam is shipped from China, but no taxes are required. The pedal is shipped from Germany. Here is your DHL tracking number: CE326625231DE
